fields.name: SW_TRIG
fields.description: Software trigger. This field is self-clearing.

enumeratedValues.name: TRIG_MODE_0
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware trigger. The softerware trigger will be ignored.

enumeratedValues.name: TRIG_MODE_1
enumeratedValues.description: Software trigger. The hardware trigger will be ignored.

fields.name: TRIG_CHAIN
fields.description: The number of segments inside the trigger chain of TRIGa.

fields.name: TRIG_PRIORITY
fields.description: External trigger priority, 7 is highest priority, while 0 is lowest

enumeratedValues.name: SYNC_MODE_0
enumeratedValues.description: Synchronization mode disabled, TRIGa and TRIG(a+4) are triggered independently.

enumeratedValues.name: SYNC_MODE_1
enumeratedValues.description: Synchronization mode enabled, TRIGa and TRIG(a+4) are triggered by TRIGa source synchronously.
